https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iErIEQriMEfo7Frl3mod3hMyHKT.jpg 1973, the Vietnam War is coming to a close as the world buckles under new attitudes and changing priorities. Far from the din of history, in a small village in southern Iceland, a young man falls for a soldier at the nearby US army base. Bobo - A Man Apart
